name: Limby Bimby
description:
This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".

You only have two limbs joined together and you must choose how to utilize them across the different platforms and hills. You can propel or swing yourself to gain momentum. There are 5 stages with increasing difficulty and a timer. You can share your time and feedback in the comments :)

How to play:

- Arrow keys to rotate

- Z to Jump when the boot is touching a surface

- Hold X to Grab with the hand when its touching a surface

- R to restart.

All logic and assets were made in 48 hours for the jam. Unity and Playmaker.

Music: piano-playing-classical-music  Freesound.org
Some assets were taken from the internet.
